item.title: Work Experience
item.description: Software Developer Intern, Bell Canada May 2023 - May 2024 • Expanded Contractor Dashboard (CDB), a Vue.js/Express/Node/SQL stack TypeScript internal web application for Bell contractors to securely report insights to management, to 2 new business divisions. • Streamlined business intelligence reporting of unresolved Smart Home and Wireless customer linkups from a Google Forms workflow to a tailored full-stack web app, reducing turnaround time by more than 50%. Read more Meta Open Source, MLH Fellowship May 2022 - Aug 2022 • Integrated Meta’s Mapillary GeoJSON APIs with Meta’s MapWithAI Rapid Editor, enabling OpenStreetMap contributors to access street imagery datasets, through maintainer-approved pull requests on GitHub.
